author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 13-year-old boy, M. Saravanan, of Yanaikuzhai in Anna Nagar drowned in a quarry pit at Vandiyur on Sunday.

Police said that the boy, studying fifth standard, had gone to the quarry pit for bathing around 2.30 p.m. However, he drowned in the water. His body was fished out an hour later.

Anna Nagar police are investigating.
title: Boy drowns in quarry pit
